New Records: Lewis Miller scored his first international goal in the match
Craig Goodwin scored his second goal for Australia in this game
Nishan Velupillay scored his debut international goal
Key Match Events: Australia scored three goals in total during the match
Lewis Miller scored the first goal for Australia in the 32nd minute
Craig Goodwin scored the second goal for Australia in the 58th minute
Nishan Velupillay scored the third goal for Australia in stoppage time
Pre-Game Insights: Australia was struggling with just one point from their first two games before this match
Tony Popovic made his debut as coach for Australia in this game
Post-Match Reflections: Tony Popovic praised the team's performance after the win
The win helped Australia's World Cup qualification hopes
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Adelaide Oval with 46,000 attendees
Australia is second in their group above Saudi Arabia
